channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Travel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Travel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47627|2024-10-07T14:03:51.611Z -- wp%20travel -- wp%20travel%20gutenberg%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Travel WP Travel Gutenberg Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Travel Gutenberg Blocks: from n/a through 3.6.0.
